title: DDFP 576: Deep dive into 'All or Nothing' with Keith Cossrow
itunes:title: DDFP 576: Deep dive into 'All or Nothing' with Keith Cossrow
description:
Dave Dameshek and actor Brian Baumgartner are joined by "All or Nothing" coordinating producer Keith Cossrow to discuss everything about "All or Nothing" with the Los Angeles Rams, including what it was like to be there when Jeff Fisher was fired, how Jon Hamm has become perfect in his role on the show and if the crew becomes invested in the team. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
